test.name: select expressions, functions, operators
test.db_create: CREATE TABLE test_table ( id INT NOT NULL, aa INT NOT NULL, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, mm VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, kk VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, f1 FLOAT NOT NULL, f2 FLOAT NOT NULL );
CREATE TABLE cmp_table ( id INT NOT NULL, title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, mva32 VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, mva64 VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, f1 FLOAT NOT NULL, gid INT NOT NULL );
test.db_insert: INSERT INTO test_table ( id, aa, title, mm, kk, f1, f2 ) VALUES ( 1, 2, 'dummy', '', 'one', 0, 0 ), ( 10, 3, 'ohai', '7 40', 'ten', 0, 0 ), ( 11, 4, 'ohai2', '', 'eleventy', 0.123123, 0.456789 )
